content:
Hi team, I was thinking to add a new rustbot capability: @rustbot ping rustdoc to alert the rustdoc team of issues of interest.
For this reason I'd keep this trigger ping manual and not automatic.

Use case: ping the team for issues that have high priority

Text of the ping message could be something along the line of:

[ping.rustdoc]
message = "Hey Rustdoc team! This issue has been labeled for closer inspection."
label = "T-rustdoc"

Opinions?
Is there a reason to not cc @rust-lang/rustdoc?
Hum... It might be useful for people who can't use this alias, otherwise I don't know

simulacrum said:

Is there a reason to not cc @rust-lang/rustdoc?

@simulacrum you mean to simply mention the team in the issue? you're right and it's easier. I'll keep that in mind!

Use case: ping the team for issues that have high priority

Everyone in the Prioritization WG can ping @rust-lang/rustdoc, do you think anyone outside of the rust-lang org would use this?
right I meant it as a tool for us, but Mark correctly points out that we dont need another "ping target" when we can simply @mention the team :)
